books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story of decadence and excess, chronicling the lives of mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby and his obsession with the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel focusing on the consequences of totalitarianism, mass surveillance, and repressive regimentation.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel following the emotional development of Elizabeth Bennet, who learns the error of making hasty judgments.
